original_title: うる星やつら: ヤギさんとチーズ
overview: Mendou recounts an old story that warns, “Don’t take pictures in front of the statue of Great-Grandfather’s Goat, or terrible things will happen!”  When his father does just that, only Sakura and Onsen-mark the Teacher can ward off the horrifying consequences of an ancient family curse… or can they?
title: Urusei Yatsura: Goat and Cheese
